name: Pumpkin Pie (Libbyâ€™s on can label)
instructions: Mix sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger and cloves in small bowl.
Beat eggs in and add pumpkin.
Reduce temperature to 350, bake for 40-50 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
You can use 1 3/4 tsp pumpkin pie spice in place of cinnamon, ginger and cloves, but it will taste slightly different.
Also, I generally add more cinnamon than 1 t.
